encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

bibl.title: with contributions by several authors, The Roman Imperial Quarries. Survey and Excavations at Mons Porphyrites, 1994-1998. Volume 2: The Excavations. (Excavations Memoirs. 82.)
bibl.biblScope: 1 front., nombr. tabl., profils, figg, cartes, plans, pll.
bibl.note: Vol. 1: London, 2001. - Report on the Egypt Exploration Society's excavations conducted between 1996 and 1998. - Pp. 397-411, tabl., figg.: Wilfried VAN RENGEN, The Written Evidence: Inscriptions and Ostraca. Presentation of some of the more significant ostraca (the full publication will follow in a separate volume), inscriptions from the site in I. Pan, not in I. Pan., and 3 new items.
